name: Reflective Shield
desc:
An advanced shield generated by the %s, It's high curvitude allows it to %s incoming projectiles (not including missiles), while it can't prevent the damage of reflected projectiles it reduces all incoming damage by %s, reflected projectiles deals %s more damage.
Increases active shield flux cost by %s.

desc: Advanced Titanium plates powered by the ship flux core providing protection against both damage and EMP threats.
